mapper.select: select SIDO_CODE, SIDO_NAME from SIDO order by SIDO_CODE asc
select SIGUNGU_CODE, SIDO_CODE, SIGUNGU_NAME from SIGUNGU where SIDO_CODE = #{sido_code} order by SIDO_CODE asc
select SIGUNGU_CODE, SIDO_CODE, SIGUNGU_NAME from SIGUNGU where SIGUNGU_CODE = #{sigungu_code} order by SIDO_CODE asc

select SALES_YEAR,
TRUNC(AVG(DECODE(SALES_BUNGI_CODE,1, SALES_MEN_PRICE, 2, SALES_MEN_PRICE))) FIRST, TRUNC(AVG(DECODE(SALES_BUNGI_CODE,3, SALES_MEN_PRICE, 4, SALES_MEN_PRICE))) SECOND,
SALES_SER_NAME, #{commercial_name} commercial_name
from SALES_TEMP_CSCODE where SALES_BD_NAME = #{sigungu} and SALES_CS_CODE like #{large} || '%' and SALES_CS_CODE like #{middle} || '%' and to_char(SALES_YEAR) >= to_char(add_months(sysdate, -12), 'yyyy')
GROUP BY SALES_SER_NAME,SALES_YEAR
